title: President Trump Announces Presidential Delegation to the State of Israel to Attend the Opening of the United States Embassy in Jerusalem, Israel â€“ The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Foreign Policy	

Issued on:
May 7, 2018
President Donald J. Trump today announced the designation of a Presidential Delegation to the State of Israel to attend the opening of the United States Embassy on May 14, 2018, in Jerusalem, Israel.The Honorable John J. Sullivan, Deputy Secretary of State, will lead the delegation.Members of the Presidential Delegation:The Honorable David M. Friedman, United States Ambassador to the State of IsraelThe Honorable Steven T. Mnuchin, United States Secretary of the TreasuryThe Honorable Jared Kushner, Assistant to the President and Senior Advisor to the PresidentThe Honorable Ivanka Trump, Assistant to the President and Advisor to the PresidentThe Honorable Jason D. Greenblatt, Assistant to the President and Special Representative for International Negotiations
